fields.name: ACBC Code
fields.title: ACBC Code
fields.description: sample code defined as part of the project where ACBC is the Antarctic Circumnavigation Bacteria Collection. Each code is unique and each sample was assigned a code

fields.name: ace_sample_number
fields.title: ACE sample code
fields.description: each sample collected as part of the Antarctic Circumnavigation Expedition (ACE) was assigned a unique sample number, ensuring it could be uniquely identified amongst all ACE samples. This sample number is written in the format: shipname(AT = R/V Akademik Tryoshnikov)/expeditionname(ACE)/leg number of expedition/ACE project number/julian day of year/ACE event number/ACE project principal investigator initials/ACE project sample number

fields.name: Top-hit strain name
fields.title: Top-hit strain name
fields.description: if this column includes (T) this means it is a type strain

fields.name: % similarity
fields.title: % similarity
fields.description: pairwise sequence similarity is the key criterion for microbial identification and as suggested by Kim et al. (2014), a species boundary is defined by a similarity value of 98.65% or greater. In other words, if two sequences show a similarity of 98.65% or less, they belong to different species

fields.name: station
fields.title: Station
fields.description: this is the station number assigned by ACE, where it is a location where a number of instrument deployments were made

fields.name: event number
fields.title: Event number
fields.description: this is the event number assigned by ACE, when an instrument deployment or sampling event took place

fields.name: sampling depth (m)
fields.title: Sampling depth (m)
fields.description: the depth at which the water sample was taken from which the sample resulted (measured in metres below the surface). If the depth is 0 m, then this sample was obtained from the underway water supply line on the ship [m]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: depth at which the water sample was taken from which the sample resulted

fields.name: Medium
fields.title: Medium
fields.description: type of culture medium used. R2A: "poor culture medium" https://assets.thermofisher.com/TFS-Assets/LSG/manuals/IFU112543.pdf or MA: Marine Agar "rich medium" https://www.bd.com/europe/regulatory/Assets/IFU/Difco_BBL/212185.pdf

fields.name: Sampling time yyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.sss (UTC time)
fields.title: Sampling time
fields.description: date and time at which the sample was taken in ISO8601 format yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss [UTC]

fields.name: Latitude [degrees_north]
fields.title: Latitude
fields.description: latitude at which the sample was taken [decimal degrees north]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: latitude at which the sample was taken

fields.name: Longitude [degrees_east]
fields.title: Longitude
fields.description: longitude at which the sample was taken [decimal degrees east]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: longitude at which the sample was taken

fields.name: Link to NCBI database
fields.title: Link to NCBI database
fields.description: URL of where the sample can be found in the NCBI database
